@ntoktrades (3/3) …mandatory randomized testing (must be 5 years or older to be eligible). If selected, these children will not be required to quarantine while awaiting their test result. 
  
 Please ensure you follow your local public health travel requirements.

@ntoktrades (2/3) Children will no longer need to wait 14 days before attending group settings, such as school, camp or daycare. They will no longer need to take a Day 8 test, and will only be required to take a test upon arrival to Canada if selected for…

@ntoktrades (1/3) Hi, thanks for your question. Unvaccinated or partially vaccinated children under 12 years old, travelling with fully vaccinated parents and other eligible adults will continue to be exempt from quarantine, without any prescribed conditions limiting their activities.

@GovCanHealth Why health officials and government officials are lying about the actual situation of pandemic in Canada to Canadians. We are do have the freedom and rights to know the actual number of infected covid19 people and where are the hot zones for prevention. Check Hong Kong crisis
